meanings.definition: The anterior lobe of the pituitary gland, producing and secreting various hormones.
meanings.sent1: The adenohypophyses play a crucial role in hormone production.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the adenohypophyses to understand hormone regulation.
meanings.sent3: The adenohypophyses decided to throw a hormone party.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like the bustling activity of the adenohypophyses.
meanings.sent5: The adenohypophyses are like tiny hormone factories in the body.
